ygData.subject: Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: Life in here again.  :)  Hi all. How do you determine what weapon to put in what hand, for best results?  I haven t seen this come up in a looong time, and
ygData.messageBody:
Life in here again. :) Hi all.

How do you determine what weapon to put in what hand, for best results? I
haven't seen this come up in a looong time, and until recently, it has been
a no brainer for me. :)

But, for a while, I had an 8/24 and a 6/19, and I assumed the 8/24 was best
in the primary hand, but someone said it might be better to have the 6/19 in
primary.

Well, now I have an 11/23 and a 12/26. Initially, I'd put the 11/23 in
primary, since it's faster, but..well, I just don't know.

Atonal the slow
Would you believe 45! :)
